H0.text: If you were in Japan eating edamame, what would you be eating. Boiled Peas

H1.text: If you were in Japan eating edamame, what would you be eating. Green Beans

H2.text: If you were in Japan eating edamame, what would you be eating. Mung Beans

H3.text: If you were in Japan eating edamame, what would you be eating. Soy

A4.text: Edamame is prepared with immature soybeans in their pods

A5.text: Edamame is soy and is classed as a major food allergen
